<<<<<<< HEAD
A letter to Edw. Stillingfleet, D.D. &c. in answer to the epistle dedicatory before his sermon, preached at a publick ordination at St. Peter's Cornhil, March 15, 1684/5 together with some reflections upon certain letters, which Dr. Burnet wrote on the same occasion / by Simon Lowth ... Lowth, Simon, 1630?-1720.
[3], 84 p.
Printed by J.L. and are to be sold by Randal Taylor ..., London : 1687.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
=======
A letter to Edw. Stillingfleet, D.D. &c. in answer to the epistle dedicatory before his sermon, preached at a publick ordination at St. Peter's Cornhil, March 15, 1684/5 together with some reflections upon certain letters, which Dr. Burnet wrote on the same occasion / by Simon Lowth ... Lowth, Simon, 1630?-1720.
[3], 84 p.
Printed by J.L. and are to be sold by Randal Taylor ..., London : 1687.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Randal Taylor
